name: Calm
summary: Sleep stories, meditation, and relaxation app
description: Calm is the #1 app for sleep, meditation and relaxation. Join millions experiencing better sleep, lower stress, and less anxiety with guided meditations, sleep stories, breathing programs, and relaxing music.

sections.title: About Calm
sections.text: Calm is designed to help you relax, sleep better, and improve your overall mental health. Whether you have a few minutes or an hour, Calm has meditation, breathing exercises, and sleep content for you.

sections.title: Key Features
sections.text:
• Sleep Stories narrated by celebrities (Matthew McConaughey, Stephen Fry, etc.)
• Guided meditations from 3-25 minutes
• Breathing exercises for anxiety and stress
• Calming music and soundscapes
• Masterclasses on mindful living
• Daily Calm: 10-minute daily meditation
• Body scanning and visualization

sections.title: Best For
sections.text: Calm excels at sleep support with its extensive library of Sleep Stories and soundscapes. It's ideal for people struggling with insomnia or racing thoughts at night. Also great for beginners to meditation.

sections.title: Pricing
sections.text: 7-day free trial. After trial: $14.99/month, $69.99/year, or $399.99 lifetime. Family plan: $99.99/year for up to 6 people. Limited free content available without subscription.
